about.summary: I'm Pablo, a physical engineer venturing into data engineering and software development, passionate about building scalable and efficient solutions. With a solid foundation in data storage, ETL processes, and programming concepts, I'm eager to contribute to innovative projects and continue to grow professionally.

experience.description: Assisted in the development and maintenance of data pipelines. Contributed to data quality assurance processes. Gained practical experience with ETL tools and cloud platforms.
Developed and tested software modules for various client projects. Collaborated with senior developers on code reviews and debugging. Participated in agile development methodologies.
Designed and developed websites for small businesses. Managed client communication and project deadlines. Integrated third-party APIs and services.

projects.title: Data pipeline for e-commerce analytics
projects.description: Developed a robust pipeline to collect, process, and analyze sales data, providing insights into customer trends and behavior.

projects.title: Real-time stock market data analysis
projects.description: Built a real-time stock market data analysis system, enabling rapid investment decisions and risk management.

projects.title: Customer segmentation using Machine Learning
projects.description: Implemented machine learning algorithms to segment customers based on purchasing patterns, improving targeted marketing strategies.

education.degree: M.Sc. en Ciencias de la Computación
education.details: Specialized in Data Science and Machine Learning. Thesis on 'Optimizing ETL pipelines for Big Data'.
Graduated with honors. Final project involved developing a web-based inventory management system.
